A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
A backend API service that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
User authentication and subscription management system
Auto-population of risk assessment data from database
Chart generation based on selected risk assessment items
Database schema design to support risk assessment data
API endpoints for fetching risk assessment items and related data
User interface with alice blue background and steel blue components
Subscription feature to control access to risk assessment tools
Data visualization components for displaying risk charts
User dashboard for managing assessments and reports
Concurrent development setup with npm scripts for installation and execution
